title: Exception to liability
context: [ยง396-15] Exception to liability. Any employee who is required by the regulations under this chapter to be trained and certified in first aid, and consequently renders first aid care as provided by this chapter, shall not be liable for any civil damages resulting from the employee&rsquo;s acts or omissions, except for such damages as may result from the employee&rsquo;s gross negligence or wanton acts or omissions.
